Actually renders the given argument. This is a synthetic bridge method, always casting down its argument and then handing it off to a worker function which does the actual work. In all probabilty, the class Render is generic (Render<T extends Entity) and this method has signature public void func_147_a(T entity, double d, double d1, double d2, float f, float f1). But JAD is pre 1.5 so doesn't do that.
